required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Real-world Study for the Safety of Albumin-Bound Paclitaxel in Recurrent or Metastatic Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Real-world Study for the Safety of Albumin-Bound Paclitaxel in Recurrent or Metastatic Breast Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multi-center, Prospective, observational study，to evaluate the safety and influencing factors of albumin-bound paclitaxel in the real-world chinese population，and evaluate of the efficacy of albumin-bound paclitaxel in patients with recurrent or metastatic breast cancer and its impact on quality of life.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage and severity of Participants With Adverse Events (AEs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 28 days after the end of the last chemotherapy cycle
primary_outcome.description: percentage and CTC AE(v4.0) of AEs

secondary_outcome.measure: Objective response rate (ORR) Assessed Using Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors Version 1.1 (RECIST v1.1)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From signing informed consent，assessed up to end of study (up to approximately 24months)
secondary_outcome.description: ORR is defined as the rate of CR or PR, as determined by IRC using RECIST v1.1 criteria.

secondary_outcome.measure: evaluate patients' quality of life by the European Cancer Research and Treatment Tissue Cancer Quality Core Questionnaire EORTCQLQ-C30
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From signing informed consent，assessed up to end of study (up to approximately 24months)
secondary_outcome.description: EORTC QLQC30 scale was used to score the quality of life before treatment, at each chemotherapy cycle, and at the end of treatment.

intervention.description: Observational study of this study, no interventions involved

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- In patients with breast cancer who have been treated with albumin-bound paclitaxel for the treatment of metastatic breast cancer who failed to undergo chemotherapy or who have relapsed within 6 months after adjuvant chemotherapy, unless there is a clinical contraindication, the previous chemotherapy regimen must include an a anthracycline drug
Exclusion Criteria:
- No

overall_official.affiliation: Shiyao Group Ouyi Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd.

facility.name: Tumor Hospital of Harbin Medical University
Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Cancer Hospital
Cancer Hospital Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences
